game.name: Gridpaper
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 캐주얼, 인디, 레이싱, 무료 플레이, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 통계, Steam 순위표
game.shortDescription: If you're shooting more than once, you're doing it wrong. Gridpaper is a high-precision FPS speed running game. Killing en masse should be mathematically precise, so do it on grid paper. Death is beautiful when murder is precise.
game.shortDescriptionEn: If you're shooting more than once, you're doing it wrong. Gridpaper is a high-precision FPS speed running game. Killing en masse should be mathematically precise, so do it on grid paper. Death is beautiful when murder is precise.
